name: King of Texas
description: Jon Bega’s dream has just come true, he’s been drafted as the new running back for one of America’s best football team, the Dallas Sheriffs. What will happen to this athletic Louisianan when he moves up to Texas to join this new team?
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 500 MB available space
